1: <pb/><e>Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj David. Sc'an vin̈aj Jedutún cuchb'um b'it.</e> <pb/><t>An̈ejton d'a Dios tz'ilchaj junc'olal vuuj. A d'ay scot in colnab'il.</t>
2: <t>An̈ej tzin colaneli, a tz'ochpax ven̈uloc. Malaj b'aq'uin̈ ol in ac'joc ganar yujto a' ayoch in colnab'iloc.</t>
3: <t>¿B'aq'uin̈ ol eyactej eyoch b'ulan d'ayin yic ol in e tec'ancanem eyalani? Ichato toxo val tzin telvi icha junoc pat c'axo, ma icha junoc macte' toxo tz'ec' lecnajoc.</t>
4: <t>Axon̈ej tas tz'aj yixtaxel in b'inajnaquil tze naub'tan̈ej. E q'uinalxon̈ej e naanq'ue es. Tze tz'ac eyal vach' lolonel d'ayin, palta axo d'a e pensar, tzin e catab'ej.</t>
5: <t>An̈ej d'a Dios tz'ilchaj junc'olal vuuj. An̈ej ayoch yipoc in c'ool.</t>
6: <t>An̈ej tzin colaneli, tz'ochpax ven̈uloc. Man̈ ol in telvoclaj. A' ayoch in colnab'iloc.</t>
7: <t>A d'a Dios scot in colnab'il, yuj chi' ay velc'ochi. A' ayoch ven̈uloc yed' in colnab'iloc.</t>
8: <t>Ex vetchon̈ab', an̈ej Dios tzeyac'och yipoc e c'ool. D'a smasanil e c'ool, tzex lesalvi d'ay, yujto a co colnab'il yaji.</t>
9: <t>A eb' anima, juneln̈ej malaj jab'oc yelc'och eb', vach'chom meb'a' eb', ma b'eyum eb'. Q'uinaloc tz'echtaj yalil eb' d'a junoc echlab' smasanil, toton max checlajlaj jab'oc yalil eb' chi', yuj chi' man̈ caq'uec ochlaj co pensar d'a eb'.</t>
10: <t>Man̈ eyac'och ixtoj anima, ma elc'al yipoc e c'ool. Tato tzex och b'eyumal, man̈ eyac'och e b'eyumal chi' yipoc e c'ool.</t>
11: <t>Man̈ jantacoc vab'an yalchaji to a Dios aljinaccan icha tic: A in Dios Yajal in tic, masanil syal vuuj, ayn̈ej pax in vach'c'olal. Tzin pactzitej d'a junjun anima icha syal tas tz'el sc'ulani, xchi Dios.</t>
